testcase.name: Verify The Fields in the Advanced Configurations Sections
testcase.system-out: Given user is on homepage...................................................passed When user Clicks on "Advanced Configuration" Section........................passed Then Verify Basic Fields on "Advanced Configurations" Section...............passed When user Clicks on "Test Settings" Tab.....................................passed Then Verify Basic Fields on "Test Settings" Tab.............................passed When user Clicks on "Advanced" Tab..........................................passed Then Verify Basic Fields on "Advanced" Tab..................................passed When user Clicks on "Chromium" Tab..........................................passed Then Verify Basic Fields on "Chromium" Tab..................................passed When user Clicks on "Script" Tab............................................passed Then Verify Basic Fields on "Script" Tab....................................passed When user Clicks on "Block" Tab.............................................passed Then Verify Basic Fields on "Block" Tab.....................................passed When user Clicks on "SPOF" Tab..............................................passed Then Verify Basic Fields on "SPOF" Tab......................................passed When user Clicks on "Custom" Tab............................................passed Then Verify Basic Fields on "Custom" Tab....................................passed
